product_name: Bug Doom Home Insect Control Gallon with Wand
description:
Shield your home from invading pests

Bug Doom Home Insect Control Gallon with Wand uses chrysanthemum extract and canola oil to create a protective barrier around your home, keeping pests out.

Preventing an infestation is easier than treating one. Bug Doom Outdoor forms a protective zone around your home's perimeter using botanically derived ingredients, effectively repelling and killing ants, spiders, cockroaches, and dozens of other pests. The ready-to-use formula requires no mixing, and the included motorized wand makes application fast and easy. With no harsh chemicals or unpleasant odor, it's a worry-free way to keep pests at bay.

Sunday creates effective pest control solutions that care for your home and the world around it.

sections.product_features:
Outdoor perimeter and spot treatment pest control
Kills dozens of pests including ants, spiders, cockroaches, and more
Powered by chrysanthemum extract and canola oil
Formulated without harsh chemicals—uses botanically derived ingredients
No unpleasant odor
Ready to use—no mixing required
Motorized wand for easy, fast application
Covers up to 1,500 sq. ft. foundation
sections.ingredients: Pyrethrin: Naturally derived from chrysanthemums; acts as an insect neurotoxin to quickly eliminate pests.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply when pests are active and outdoor areas are dry.
Apply as home perimeter or spot treatment Home perimeter application: Spray Bug Doom Outdoor 1 foot up and 1 foot out from your home's foundation to create a protective barrier. Spot treatment: Apply directly to any known infestation areas or where pests are present.
Home perimeter application: Spray Bug Doom Outdoor 1 foot up and 1 foot out from your home's foundation to create a protective barrier.
Spot treatment: Apply directly to any known infestation areas or where pests are present.
Reapply every 2–4 weeks or after heavy rain to maintain a strong barrier.
Test spray in an inconspicuous area (especially on porous surfaces) and allow it to dry to check for possible staining before treating an entire area.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
What pests does Bug Doom Outdoor control?
Bug Doom Outdoor is effective against ants (excluding fire ants, harvester ants, Pharaoh ants, and carpenter ants), spiders (excluding black widow, brown recluse, and hobo spiders), beetles, cockroaches, crickets, earwigs, flies, moths, silverfish, stink bugs, and more. Check the label for a full list of pests.
Is there a risk of staining?
Bug Doom contains canola oil, which may cause slight staining on some surfaces. We recommend testing in an inconspicuous area before full application.
Can I use Bug Doom Outdoor alongside other Sunday products?
Yes! Bug Doom Outdoor is designed to work with other Sunday products. Allow recommended dry times between applications.
When will I see results?
You can expect immediate impact on pests after application, with lasting protection for up to 4 weeks when used as directed.
Any state restrictions?
This product is approved for use in all states.
